mapper.insert: INSERT INTO branch( BRANCH_NO , BRANCH_MANAGER_NAME , BRANCH_MANAGER_PHONE , BRANCH_TEL , BRANCH_REG_DATE, LOCAL_CODE_NO, ZIP_CODE, ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, BUSINESS_LICENSE_NO, USAGE_STATUS_CODE, BRANCH_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_BRANCH_NO.NEXTVAL , #{branchManagerName} , #{branchManagerPhone} , #{branchTel} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD'), #{localCodeNo} , #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{detailAdress}, #{businessLicenseNo}, #{branchStatusCodeNo}, #{branchName})
mapper.select: SELECT b.BRANCH_NO , b.BRANCH_MANAGER_NAME , b.BRANCH_MANAGER_PHONE , b.BRANCH_TEL, b.BRANCH_REG_DATE, b.LOCAL_CODE_NO, b.ZIP_CODE, b.ADDRESS, b.DETAIL_ADDRESS, b.BUSINESS_LICENSE_NO, b.USAGE_STATUS_CODE, b.BRANCH_NAME, c.CODE_NAME FROM branch b, code c WHERE c.group_code = 'local' AND b.LOCAL_CODE_NO = c.CODE_NO AND BRANCH_NO = #{value}
